title: $250 security deposit? sign me up!
posting_body: ['We believe elevating where you live is about blending it seamlessly with how you live.', 'We go to great lengths designing amenities and choosing locations that put everything within reach.', 'Where you live, is where you come alive.', 'Resting in the heart of Silicon Valley, just a short drive from San Francisco, Avalon Mountain View offers thoughtfully designed and newly renovated one-, two- and three-bedroom Mountain View apartments.', 'And now with our Furnished+ program, apartment living is easier than ever before.', 'Appreciate the stylish furnishings and enjoy the convenience of pre-installed Wi-Fi and cable TV, flexible lease-terms, and utilities that are included in your rent.', 'With Furnished+, you can step right into the life you want to live, without all the hassle.', 'Upgrade any home to Furnished+ and enjoy the convenience of turnkey living.', 'These exquisite rentals feature world class amenities and community facilities that ensure the best in upscale living.', 'With everything our Avalon Mountain View apartments have to offer, you will experience the perfect blend of luxury and comfort.', 'MOUNTAIN VIEW APARTMENTS BY', 'AVALON Our Mountain View apartment rentals are just steps from downtown and offer a wide variety of amazing restaurants and fun entertainment options to explore.', 'The Performing Arts Center hosts a series of family-friendly productions each week.', 'You can stop by the Farmers’ Market or spend a day at one of the famous local museums.', 'The Shoreline Wildlife Refuge Area and Trail is a 750-acre park that offers sailing, boating and windsurfing opportunities set amongst the local wildlife.', 'Also, with the 101 Highway, Cal Train and the VTA Light Rail all right next to our Mountain View apartments, you can head to the Bay Area for a weekend getaway.', 'With the abundant options at your disposal, you’ll always find a way to enjoy your leisure time as a resident of Avalon Mountain View.', 'MOUNTAIN VIEW APARTMENT COMMUNITY Avalon offers all residents an exclusive set of benefits that form part of what we call the Avalon Advantage.', 'You can enjoy privileges such as a 30-day move-in guarantee, a national relocation program, maintenance response guarantees, flexible lease terms and much more.', 'The apartments in Mountain View are well equipped to cater to all your needs and demands.', 'Don’t wait any longer!', 'Contact Us immediately and find a whole new world of Mountain View apartments.', '-Parking', '-Balcony/Patio', '-In-Unit Washer/Dryer', '-Pet Friendly', '-Air Conditioning', '-Green Apartment', '-Green Community', '-Pool', 'Call:', 'show contact info']
